cars.name: Toyota Corolla 2020
cars.description: The 2020 Toyota Corolla, part of the 12th generation, is a compact sedan known for its reliability, modern design, and advanced features. It offers a blend of efficiency, technology, and safety, available in multiple trims to suit various preferences. Exterior Design: Sleek and Sporty Look: Features a bold front grille, sharp lines, and available LED headlights and taillights. Trim Levels: L (base), LE, SE, XLE, and XSE. Sportier SE and XSE trims include aerodynamic enhancements, rear spoiler, and 18-inch alloy wheels (XSE).

cars.name: Ford EcoSport 2018
cars.description: The 2018 Ford EcoSport is a compact SUV that blends practicality, modern design, and advanced technology. Exterior Design: Sleek and Sporty with bold grille, LED DRLs, and sculpted body lines. Trim Levels: S, SE (SYNC 3, alloy wheels), Titanium (Leather seats, sunroof), SES (AWD, tuned suspension), Titanium AWD (Fully loaded).

cars.name: Toyota Corolla 2019
cars.description: The 2019 Toyota Corolla is a compact sedan known for its reliability and fuel efficiency. Exterior Design: Sleek with sharp lines and modern grille. Features: Sporty Performance, Advanced Technology, Toyota Safety Sense-P. Trim Levels: L, LE, LE Eco, SE, XLE, XSE.

cars.name: Honda Civic 2019
cars.description: The 2019 Honda Civic is a compact sedan with sporty design, strong performance, and fuel efficiency. Trim Levels: LX, EX, SX-L, Si, R. Great for daily driving, commuting, or sporty experience.

cars.name: Mercedes CLA 180 2018
cars.description: The 2018 Mercedes-Benz CLA 180 is a luxury sedan with a coupe-like design. Interior: premium materials, infotainment system, smartphone integration. Features: Premium package, Driving Assistance Pack, Night package.

cars.name: Mercedes S500 2023
cars.description: The Mercedes S500 is a luxury sedan with elegant design, powerful performance, and advanced technology. Exterior: aerodynamic body, bold grille, LED headlights, chrome accents, alloy wheels.

cars.name: Chery A5 2011
cars.description: The Chery A5 2011 is a compact sedan with economical features. Great for daily or family use but requires regular maintenance. Exterior: Sleek, aerodynamic, modern yet simple design.
